meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Becky Warren Lori Goodman Rick Terpstra Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7817.

td.p: Becky Warren, a rock musician from Nashville, Tennessee
Lori Goodman, a nonprofit executive director from Goleta, California
Rick Terpstra, an aspiring English teacher from Havertown, Pennsylvania (whose 3-day cash winnings total $60,000)

tr.td: SCIENCE AROUND US
GO FLY A KITE!
NUMERICAL CINEMA
I'M ALLEN
U.S. HISTORY
THAT ENDED "WELL"
